description:
**Fix Overview**:

To address the Windows Kernel elevation of privilege vulnerability (CVE-2024-20698):

1. Download the necessary update packages from the Microsoft Update Catalog based on your system build.
2. Install the updates to mitigate the privilege escalation threat.
3. Restart your system to apply changes.

**Details**:
- Applicable updates include KB5034121, KB5034122, KB5034123, KB5034127, and KB5034129.
- For manual installation, follow the links to the official update packages:
  - [KB5034121](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5034121)
  - [KB5034123](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5034123)
  - [KB5034127](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5034127)
  - [KB5034122](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5034122)
  - [KB5034129](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5034129).

**Preconditions**:
- Ensure your system build matches the versions specified in the post.
- Backup critical data before proceeding with the updates.
